mapper.insert: insert into financial_management (f_id, f_type, f_front_money, f_after_money, f_money, f_date, f_mr_date, m_id, f_remarks, f_file) values (#{fId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fFrontMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fAfterMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{fMrDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update financial_management set f_type = #{fType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_front_money = #{fFrontMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, f_after_money = #{fAfterMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, f_money = #{fMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, f_date = #{fDate,jdbcType=DATE}, f_mr_date = #{fMrDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_remarks = #{fRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_file = #{fFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where f_id = #{fId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select f_id, f_type, f_front_money, f_after_money, f_money, f_date, f_mr_date, m_id, f_remarks, f_file from financial_management where f_id = #{fId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select f_id, f_type, f_front_money, f_after_money, f_money, f_date, f_mr_date, m_id, f_remarks, f_file from financial_management
